box2D.dynamics.joints.B2Joint

type
class
subclasses
box2D.dynamics.joints.B2DistanceJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2FrictionJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2GearJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2LineJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2MouseJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2PrismaticJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2PulleyJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2RevoluteJoint, box2D.dynamics.joints.B2WeldJoint
The base joint class. Joints are used to constraint two bodies together in various fashions. Some joints also feature limits and motors.

Static Variables

e_atLowerLimit : Int

e_atUpperLimit : Int

e_distanceJoint : Int

e_equalLimits : Int

e_frictionJoint : Int

e_gearJoint : Int

e_mouseJoint : Int

e_prismaticJoint : Int

e_pulleyJoint : Int

e_revoluteJoint : Int

e_weldJoint : Int

Instance Methods

finalizeVelocityConstraints() : Void

getAnchorA() : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

Get the anchor point on bodyA in world coordinates.

getAnchorB() : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

Get the anchor point on bodyB in world coordinates.

getBodyA() : box2D.dynamics.B2Body

Get the first body attached to this joint.

getBodyB() : box2D.dynamics.B2Body

Get the second body attached to this joint.

getNext() : B2Joint

Get the next joint the world joint list.

getReactionForce(inv_dt : Float) : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

Get the reaction force on body2 at the joint anchor in Newtons.

getReactionTorque(inv_dt : Float) : Float

Get the reaction torque on body2 in N*m.

Get the type of the concrete joint.

Get the user data pointer.

returns
Short-cut function to determine if either body is inactive.
